Package oracle.kubernetes.operator.work

Class Step

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.kubernetes.operator.work.Step
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ResponseStep

    public abstract class Step
extends Object
    Individual step in a processing flow

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public abstract NextAction apply​(Packet packet)
        Invokes step using the packet as input/output context. The next action directs further processing of the Fiber.
        Parameters:
        packet - Packet
        Returns:
        Next action

      • doNext

        protected NextAction doNext​(Packet packet)
        Create NextAction that indicates that the next step be invoked with the given Packet
        Parameters:
        packet - Packet to provide when invoking the next step
        Returns:
        The next action

                            Packet packet)
        Create NextAction that indicates that the indicated step be invoked with the given Packet
        Parameters:
        step - The step
        packet - Packet to provide when invoking the next step
        Returns:
        The next action

        Returns next action that will end the fiber processing
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Next action that will end processing

                                       Packet packet)
        Returns next action that will terminate fiber processing with a throwable

                             long delay,
                             TimeUnit unit)
        Create NextAction that indicates the the current step be retried after a delay
        Parameters:
        packet - Packet to provide when retrying this step
        delay - Delay time
        unit - Delay time unit

      • doDelay

        protected NextAction doDelay​(Packet packet,
                             long delay,
                             TimeUnit unit)
        Create NextAction that indicates the the current fiber resume with the next step after a delay.
        Parameters:
        packet - Packet to provide when retrying this step
        delay - Delay time
        unit - Delay time unit
        Returns:
        The next action

      • doDelay

        protected NextAction doDelay​(Step step,
                             Packet packet,
                             long delay,
                             TimeUnit unit)
        Create NextAction that indicates the the current fiber resume with the indicated step after a delay.
        Parameters:
        step - Step from which to resume
        packet - Packet to provide when retrying this step
        delay - Delay time
        unit - Delay time unit
        Returns:
        The next action

      • doSuspend

        protected NextAction doSuspend​(Consumer<Fiber> onExit)
        Create NextAction that suspends the current Fiber. While suspended the Fiber does not consume a thread. Resume the Fiber using Fiber.resume(Packet)
        Parameters:
        onExit - Called after fiber is suspended
        Returns:
        Next action

      • doSuspend

        protected NextAction doSuspend​(Step step,
                               Consumer<Fiber> onExit)
        Create NextAction that suspends the current Fiber. While suspended the Fiber does not consume a thread. When the Fiber resumes it will start with the indicated step. Resume the Fiber using Fiber.resume(Packet)
        Parameters:
        step - Step to invoke next when resumed
        onExit - Called after fiber is suspended
        Returns:
        Next action

      • doForkJoin

        protected NextAction doForkJoin​(Step step,
                                Packet packet,
                                Collection<Step.StepAndPacket> startDetails)
        Create a NextAction that suspends the current Fiber and that starts child fibers for each step and packet pair. When all of the created child fibers complete, then this fiber is resumed with the indicated step and packet.
        Parameters:
        step - Step to invoke next when resumed after child fibers complete
        packet - Resume packet
        startDetails - Pairs of step and packet to use when starting child fibers
        Returns:
        Next action

      • createStepline

        public static Step createStepline​(List<Class<? extends Step>> steps)
        Simplifies creation of stepline. Steps will be connected following the list ordering of their classes
        Parameters:
        steps - List of step classes
        Returns:
        Head step
